Package src.main.java.gameComponents

Class Board

java.lang.Object
src.main.java.gameComponents.Board
public class Board extends Object
The Board class holds a 2D array of Cell objects, representing a 5x5 grid in the Santorini board game.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Board(int height, int width)
    Constructs a Board of size h x w (standard 5x5), initializing each cell with a new Cell instance.

    Finds the positions of two workers belonging to a specific player color.

    Returns the entire 2D array of cells for this board.

    • Board

      public Board(int height, int width)
      Constructs a Board of size h x w (standard 5x5), initializing each cell with a new Cell instance.
      Parameters:
      height - The height of the board (standard: 5).
      width - The width of the board (standard: 5).

  • Method Details

    • getBoard

      public Cell[][] getBoard()
      Returns the entire 2D array of cells for this board.
      Returns:
      2D array of Cell objects.

    • cellAt

      public Cell cellAt(int xPos, int yPos)
      Returns the Cell at the specified coordinates.
      Parameters:
      xPos - The x-coordinate (row index).
      yPos - The y-coordinate (column index).
      Returns:
      The Cell at [xPos][yPos].

    • getHeight

      public int getHeight()
      Returns the height of the whole board (standard rules: 5).
      Returns:
      the integer height of the board.

    • getWidth

      public int getWidth()
      Returns the width of the whole board (standard rules: 5).
      Returns:
      the integer width of the board.

    • placeWorker

      public void placeWorker(Worker worker, int xPos, int yPos)
      Places a Worker in the given coordinates on the board.
      Parameters:
      worker - The worker to place.
      xPos - The x-coordinate (row index).
      yPos - The y-coordinate (column index).

    • moveWorker

      public void moveWorker(Worker worker, int sxPos, int syPos, int fxPos, int fyPos)
      Moves a worker from one cell to another.
      Parameters:
      worker - The worker to move.
      sxPos - The starting x-coordinate.
      syPos - The starting y-coordinate.
      fxPos - The final x-coordinate.
      fyPos - The final y-coordinate.

    • buildTower

      public void buildTower(int fxPos, int fyPos)
      Builds (levels up) a tower at the specified coordinates.
      Parameters:
      fxPos - The x-coordinate where to build.
      fyPos - The y-coordinate where to build.

    • findWorkersOf

      public int[][] findWorkersOf(PlayerColor color)
      Finds the positions of two workers belonging to a specific player color.
      Parameters:
      color - The PlayerColor of the workers to find.
      Returns:
      A 2D array of size [2][2], where each sub-array is [x, y].
